page.title: 12Horse Riding in Sussex
page.content: Many people in the country own their own ponies.There is plenty of open country to ride in as well as special events organised by the Pony Club. Some owners are willing to share their pony with less fortunate people. The disabled have an arrangement which enables them to borrow a pony for a few hours each week,so that physically or mentally handicapped children may experience the pleasure of riding.The ponies have to be very good tempered of course.There are many owners ready to lend their ponies and take great pleasure and pride in giving such a valuable service.
